member.name: P:MvvmCross.Forms.Presenters.Attributes.MvxPagePresentationAttribute.HostViewModelType
member.summary: ViewModel Type to show as host before showing the actual view. Optional when not using switching between Forms views and native views.

member.name: P:MvvmCross.Forms.Presenters.Attributes.MvxPagePresentationAttribute.WrapInNavigationPage
member.summary: Wraps the Page in a MvxNavigationPage if set to true. If the current stack already is a MvxNavigationPage it will push the Page onto that.
member.value: true if wrap in navigation page; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:MvvmCross.Forms.Presenters.Attributes.MvxPagePresentationAttribute.NoHistory
member.summary: Clears the backstack of the current NavigationPage when set to true
member.value: true if no history; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MvvmCross.Forms.Presenters.MvxFormsPagePresenter.#ctor(MvvmCross.Forms.Presenters.IMvxFormsViewPresenter)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The native platform presenter from where the MvxFormsPagePresenter is created
